name: Wood 'n Stones (itch)
description:
Launch discount: 20% Limited Time Offer

Wood 'n Stones is an innovative rogue-like survival game set in the Stone Age, where cooperation is the key to success. 

While dinosaurs and other evil creatures pose a danger to the future of human kind, you can be the leader who will allow our species to survive to the present day, thanks to the help of a great friend, a puppy and all the people that you'll save during the journey.

You can gather Wood and Stones to help out your tribe defending yourself and them, and build campfires to better protect your way. But beware: the weather can change at any time.

Also available on Steam, from late November, 2019!

Launch discount: 20% Limited Time Offer
